subject: Soccer
Title IX (Gender Discrimination Legislation)
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: April Heinrichs, the technical director for the United States women’s national team, says talented young players should compete with older girls and boys.
snippet: April Heinrichs, the technical director for the United States women’s national team, says talented young players should compete with older girls and boys.
